name: App
description: Pesticidal proteins with a predominately Alpha helical structure, e.g. those previously known as Cry6

name: Cyt
description: Mnemonic retained for Cyt related proteins

name: Gpp
description: Pesticidal proteins with homology to the aeGerolysins, e.g. those previously known as Cry34

name: Mcf
description: Pesticidal proteins related to Mcf proteins

name: Mpf
description: Pesticidal proteins that have homology to the Membrane Attack Complex / Perforin superfamily

name: Mpp
description: Pesticidal proteins with homology to the Etx_Mtx2 family

name: Mtx
description: Pesticidal protein related to Mtx1 proteins

name: Pra
description: Proteins related to the Photorhabdus Insect-Related toxin A component

name: Prb
description: Proteins related to the Photorhabdus Insect-Related toxin B component

name: Tpp
description: Pesticidal proteins with homology to the Toxin_10/Bin family

name: Vip
description: Mnemonic retained for Vip3 related proteins

name: Vpa
description: Pesticidal proteins related to Vip2 catalytic component

name: Vpb
description: Pesticidal proteins related to the binding partner of the Vip1/2 binary toxin, previously known as Vip1 and to the structurally-related proteins previously known as Vip4

name: Xpp
description: A holding name for pesticidal proteins with currently unclassified homology groups
